wikipedia_page.main: Paul Ballard  (born 9 March 1982 in Essex, England) is an English television presenter and stage actor best known by his nickname 'Des' as the co-presenter, along with Fearne Cotton, of the Saturday morning children's television programme Diggit from 1998 until 2002. He left Diggit shortly before its relaunch into Diggin' It.

response: *Paul 'Des' Ballard, television presenter, caused death by dangerous driving, and various other crimes including rape
* 9 March – Paul 'Des' Ballard, children's television presenter
* Paul 'Des' Ballard, Mohammed George and Simon Coray – Small Devils

Disney Club Returned on 5 November 1995, with new presenters Craig Doyle, Jenny Powel and Sean Maguire. The last series from September 1997 became two separate Disney blocks, but presented by the same people; Craig Doyle & Paul 'Des' Ballard with a name change taking place on 25 September  called Road Hog.  The series finished on 26 April 1998,BFI.org replaced by Diggit.
